reference_summary:
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used my regular shampoo, then followed up with this hair mask. Left it on for 5 mins and brushed it through my hair with a comb in the shower. The smell is amazing( if you like bananas, which I do ) After washing I let my hair air dry and my hair is so smooth and soft. I also have a nice shine to my hair. I notice with this product a little goes a long way so one bottle can last a while. Never used a hair mask before and I really like the life it gave my hair back.  I will continue to use this 1-2 times a week.
Amazing soft smooth hair after use
Utrue 2PCS Rhinestone Headbands（random color）
Utrue
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'plastic', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'Utrue', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 8.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '787365720155'}
I have to say these are really nice headbands and very well made. The stones sparkle. Now this could just be preference, I don't like how bulky they are and how much they pop up on my head. Thats why I gave them 4 stars. They are comfortable and you can wear all day without getting a headache!
Really well made.. buttt
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used this for a few treatments, what I notice, my scalp is softer and  my hair has some more moisture and a little more volume and looks healthier, Didn't notice a difference with flakes or dandruff( but I really only have issues with this in the colder months) .  I like that its all natural, less chemicals the better for my hair.
does moisturize

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor hair care products, particularly moisturizing treatments, while increasingly expressing interest in unique and thoughtful gifts, especially inspirational items and accessories that enhance daily routines. A recent purchase of temporary tattoos reflects this interest in creative and playful accessories.

- **Ingredients:** The user maintains a strong preference for organic and natural formulations in hair care, aligned with a health-conscious lifestyle and a commitment to quality products with minimal chemicals.

- **Perfume Sensitivity:** Enjoys pleasant and fruity scents, while also valuing aesthetically appealing elements such as sparkle and thoughtful design in both hair care and new accessory purchases.

- **Hair Type Focus:** Seeks products that are suitable for fine hair to enhance softness and overall hair health, with a particular emphasis on comfort in any accessories used.

- **Usage Pattern:** Upholds a consistent routine for hair care products, incorporating new items as supplements and appreciating multi-functional products. 

- **Application Method:** Prefers simple and effective application processes for hair care and values comfort in all-day wear for accessories.

- **Value for Money:** Emphasizes cost-effectiveness and product longevity, valuing high-quality solutions in hair care and newly explored gift purchases.

- **Feedback Behavior:** Actively shares satisfaction through high ratings for effective products and detailed observations on performance, particularly regarding quality and value. 

The user displays a clear trend toward high-quality hair care solutions, meaningful gifts, and playful accessories that prioritize natural ingredients, comfort, and practicality.
